alternative_title: Road occupation consent for street cafes
licence_overview:
$!You must have permission from your local council to place tables or chairs outside your premises.$!

##Restrictions

You'll also need permission if you want to place [advertising displays](/permission-to-use-street-or-pavement-space-for-displays-scotland "Permission to use street or pavement space for displays (Scotland)") outside your premises.

##How to apply

Contact your council to apply for permission to place tables or chairs outside your premises.

^Your council may charge you an application fee.^

##Displaying your licence

Your council will tell you how to display your licence.
licence_short_description: Permission for street cafes to place tables and chairs outside their premises.
overview: Get permission from your local council to place tables and chairs outside your premises.
